properties.name: edhd.admin-password
properties.description: Name to use for the EdHD database

properties.name: edhd.storage-dir
properties.description: Location to store assignment files and configurations

properties.name: edhd.threads
properties.description: Number of threads for submission processing

properties.name: edhd.hadoop.httpFS
properties.description: webhdfs url for HttpFS so that EdHD can access HDFS

properties.name: edhd.hadoop.hduser
properties.description: The user to run as for Hadoop/HDFS operations
